titles.title: A resolution making additional majority appointments to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry, and the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Appoints Senator Breaux, Louisiana, to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; and Senator Wirth, Colorado, to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs for the 100th Congress.
